name: SumHR
description: HR has long been undervalued and unappreciated due to an overreliance on paperwork, spreadsheets, and outdated software. At sumHR, we’re determined to change this by empowering HR teams with the right tools. sumHR is a SaaS based new-age product which handles the mundane processes for HR teams, reduces paperwork for managers and improves engagement for employees. We believe HR is the backbone of any company, and we aim to be the platform that brings them the credibility, appreciation, and recognition they deserve.

enhanced_description: SumHR is a modern, delightful, and comprehensive SaaS-based Human Resource Management Software designed for growing organizations, including small and global enterprises. It aims to empower HR teams by digitizing HR data and processes, thereby reducing the reliance on traditional paperwork, spreadsheets, and outdated software. The platform simplifies and automates core HR functions such as managing HR information, payroll processing, expense claims, performance reviews, and OKR tracking. By handling mundane administrative tasks, SumHR enhances efficiency for HR teams and managers, improves employee engagement, and ensures data safety and privacy, ultimately bringing credibility and appreciation to the HR function.

Automating payroll processing to ensure timeliness and ease
Facilitating performance reviews and tracking OKRs (Objectives and Key Results)
Reducing reliance on manual paperwork and spreadsheets for HR processes
Improving overall employee happiness and engagement
